text: Green Screen is an international wildlife movie festival. Since 2007 it takes place every year in Eckernf√∂rde, Germany. The festival shows full-length and short movies about animals. It is the only festival of its kind in Germany. The awarded trophy is made of natural sand. The festival also shows classic nature documentaries. Since 2008 a special prize for filmmakers is named after the famous filmmaker Heinz Sielmann. == References == ==Other websites== * Homepage Category:Movie festivals Category:Festivals in Germany Category:2007 establishments in Germany Category:Schleswig-Holstein
title: Green Screen
